text: The following is a list of notable deaths in April 2015. For notable deaths before the current month, please see "Previous months". *Name, age, country of citizenship and reason for notability, cause of death, reference (must be added) are added. __TOC__ ==April 2015== thumb|right|120px|Jayne Meadows 1919-2015 * April 1 - Misao Okawa, 117, Japanese supercentenarian, world's oldest living person, heart failure.The world's oldest person, a Japanese woman, dies at 117 * April 1 - Nicolae Rainea, 81, Romanian football referee (FIFA World Cup (1974, 1978, 1982), UEFA Euro 1980 Final), cardiac arrest.Death announcement of Nicolae Rainea * April 1 - John Paul Hammerschmidt, 92, American politician, member of United States House of Representatives from Arkansas (1967–1993), heart and respiratory failure.John Paul Hammerschmidt dies at 92 * April 1 - Eddie LeBaron, 85, American football player (Washington Redskins, Dallas Cowboys).Eddie LeBaron, who starred at UOP and in NFL, dies at 85 * April 1 - Cynthia Lennon, 75, British artist, ex-wife of John Lennon, cancer.John Lennon's Ex-Wife, Cynthia Lennon, Dead at 75 * April 2 - Luis Delgado Aparicio, 74, Peruvian politician, MP (1995–2001), pancreatic cancer.Luis Delgado Aparicio, 'El Dr. Saravá', falleció hoy a los 74 años * April 2 - Manoel de Oliveira, 106, Portuguese movie director and screenwriter, heart failure. * April 2 - Olga Sawicka, 83, Polish dancer and choreographer.Olga Sawicka nie żyje (1932 -2015) * April 2 - Robert H.
